body.p:
Footnotes are pieces of information used for several purposes, including citations, parenthetical information, outside sources, copyright permissions, background information, and more. They are divided as following:
The footnote call - It is the number that remains in the content, usually superscripted.
The footnote marker - It is the number displayed at the bottom of the page (which value matches footnote call).
The footnote text - It is the value of the fn element also displayed at the bottom of the page.
